Package VendingModel.VendingMachineClasses

Interface InterfaceVendingMachine

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegularVendingMachine, SpecialVendingMachine
public interface InterfaceVendingMachine
Interface for the VendingMachine subclasses containing the general methods that it will be used in its processing
